myCars.title: Recycle your car

info.noCarsAvailable: We cannot find any cars registered to you.

myCars.tooltip: A car cannot be recycled if it still has loans, if the car has been reported as stolen or if it has been seiced by the police. Login to see more information at https://innskranning.island.is/?id=mitt.samgongustofa.is

confirm.title: Confirm car

subTitles.confirm: Do you want select this car for recycling?

confirm.info: Adding your car for recycling which will allow you to recycle it at any of our connected recycling companies. This is not binding and the car will only be recyled if you hand over the car to a recycling company.

handover.title: Car is ready to be recycled!

subTitles.recycle: Take the car to any of our connected recycling companies for recycling

handover.info: You can take the car too any of the connected recycling companies for recycling for free. Once the car is handed over you will recive your money within 2 business days.

info.payment: Money will be payed by Fjársýsla ríkisins to your state collector within 2 days of the payment has been initiated. You will find your payment

confirmedBy.fund: Car payment inititated by Fjársýsla ríkisins

cancelModal.title: Cancel the recycling process for this car
cancelModal.info: When you cancel the recycling the car cannot be recycled at the recyclingcompanies untill you mark it for recycling again. You can simply redo the process if change your mind.
